Planned Output: 225 hect- ares of land to be acquired,
Audit Remarks: • Land acquisition under this road project and all other Critical Oil Road Projects were delayed due to the disparity issues in the land compensation rates in the re- gion. This was caused by the Oil Companies setting up the Central Processing Facility in Bulisa resulting in the need for UNRA, CGV and the oil companies to harmonize land acquisition rates. • UGX 15,649,200,000 charged on activities not related to the appropriated code.
